name: Highcliff Watch
economy_niches: seasonal lookout labor and mercantile lodging
culture_adjustments: navigational auguries institutionalized in beacon rites
clan-house power weakened by crown-sanctioned signal guilds
practical assimilation of islander boat-craft, wary social acceptance
constraints: strict maritime charters limit autonomous militias
notes: beacon network enforces tolling and navigation control
strategic chokepoint for state maritime routes
sparse inland population; economy tied to passing fleets
